맥주설명:
This is a Golden Ale that portrays the golden ray of Seongsan Ilchulbong (Sunrise Peak) tuff cone on Jeju Island, Korea.

Brewed entirely with Jeju's clear water, barley and hops, this premium beer is loved by everyone due to its fresh and rich taste.
